product_name: Sierra Designs Wild Bill 20 Sleeping Bag - Long - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Warm, reliable and affordable, the synthetic-fill, long-length Sierra Designs Wild Bill 20 Sleeping Bag is perfect for weekend warriors who enjoy backpacking throughout spring, summer and fall. Heatsync(TM) polyester insulation has a high warmth-to-weight ratio and continues to insulate even if wet. With an EN lower-limit rating of 25degF, the Wild Bill 20 is great for 3-season trips when the temps dip into the mid 20s. Offset layer construction eliminates cold spots at quilt lines and produces a high warmth-to-weight ratio. Snag-free zipper tracks prevent the dreaded stuck zipper by creating a barrier between the lining and the zipper. Draft tube backs the full-length zipper to prevent cold air from getting in. Stuff your jacket or camp pillow (not included) in the pillow pocket to increase comfort. Keep your watch or headlamp in the small chest pocket for easy access. Sierra Designs Wild Bill 20 Sleeping Bag comes with a stuff sack and storage bag. Closeout.
